DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the incidence of stomatitis when treating with amifostine before radiation treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study of Head and Neck Cancer Radiation Treatment With or Without Amifostine

DOC.keyword: Identify whether Cytofos can reduce the incidence and duration of HNC patients' oral mucositis caused by radiotherapy.
